name: extract_recipe_data
description: Extracts structured recipe information including ingredients and step-by-step instructions from text.

description.description: A brief summary or description of the dish.

prep_time_minutes.description: Estimated preparation time in minutes, if mentioned.

cook_time_minutes.description: Estimated cooking time in minutes, if mentioned.

servings.description: The number of servings the recipe yields.

ingredients.description: A list of all ingredients required.

name.description: The name of the ingredient (e.g., 'Flour', 'Chicken Breast').

quantity.description: The amount required (e.g., '2', '1.5', '1/2'). Keep as string to handle fractions.

preparation_notes.description: Specific state of the ingredient (e.g., 'finely chopped', 'room temperature', 'sifted').

group.description: The section of the recipe this ingredient belongs to (e.g., 'Sauce', 'Filling', 'Garnish'). Use 'Main' if not specified.

instructions.description: The step-by-step guide to preparing the recipe.

step_number.description: The sequential order of the step.

instruction_text.description: The detailed text for this specific step.
